text: Recall lenze ona said O Moses my ziaden longer tolerate jeden laskavy z food vola sa tvoj Lord produce us such earthly zozat fazula cucumbers cesnak lentils cibula. He said ona zelat zastupid ze kto inferior ze kto je bol dobry? Ist nadol Egypt ona zalozit co ona ziadat They incurred condemnation humiliation disgrace brought upon themselves zloba z GOD This because they zamietnut GOD's revelations killed prophets unjustly! This they disobeyed transgressed
